com.jdroid.android.billing
Class BillingManagerImpl.RequestPurchase

java.lang.Object
  com.jdroid.android.billing.BillingManagerImpl.RequestPurchase
Enclosing class:
BillingManagerImpl
public class BillingManagerImpl.RequestPurchase
extends Object

This request sends a purchase message to the Google Play app and is the foundation of in-app billing. You send this request when a user indicates that he or she wants to purchase an item in your application. The Google Play app then handles the financial transaction by displaying the checkout user interface.

public boolean runIfConnected()
